home.description: Information Systems Security Engineer with 7+ years of expertise at ASECNA. Specialist in secure network architectures and ISO 27001 compliance.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: EAMAC graduate engineer in Electronics-Computer Science with over 7 years of professional experience at ASECNA. Currently Chief Information Security Officer (CISO), I combine technical expertise and management skills thanks to a postgraduate degree in project management.
about.paragraph2: I specialize in designing and implementing secure network architectures, deploying cybersecurity policies compliant with ISO 27001 standards and ICAO strategy, and managing multi-site technical teams in critical environments.

job1.title: Chief Information Security Officer (CISO)
job1.description: Strategic cybersecurity leadership and risk management for the Agency across 19 member countries.
responsibilities: Leadership and updating of ASECNA's Information Systems Security Policy (ISSP)
Coordination of cyber risk management (identification, assessment, prioritization, treatment) according to EBIOS Risk Manager framework, ISO/IEC 27005 standards, NIST and the Agency's risk manual
Development and coordination of the incident response plan for ASECNA
Supervision of a team of 48 security referents for information systems security governance in ASECNA's 19 member countries
Compliance with ISO/IEC 27001 requirements and ICAO cybersecurity strategy
Conducting awareness campaigns and security training for users at Headquarters, Representations, Schools and Delegations of ASECNA
Technological watch and integration of innovative solutions

job2.title: Senior IT Network Specialist
job2.company: Technical and IT Resources Directorate (DTI), ASECNA
job2.description: Design and administration of network and security infrastructures for the entire Agency.
responsibilities: Design, supervision and updating of network and security architectures and infrastructures at Headquarters and in ASECNA's 19 member countries

Implementation, administration and maintenance of network and security equipment: Switch (Cisco, Fortinet), Router (Cisco, Mikrotik), FortiGate, FortiWeb, FortiManager, FortiAnalyzer, FortiAuthenticator, FortiPam, Forticlient EMS
Administration of central systems (Exchange mail, backup systems, Microsoft O365 suite, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Sentinel, SCCM, Active Directory, Linux, etc.)
Administration of the Kaspersky security system
Deployment of security measures, support and assistance to users at Headquarters and Centers
Management (design, monitoring and implementation) of strategic projects for network modernization and IT security

Proposal of topics and supervision of final dissertations for Engineers and senior technicians in civil aviation operations, specializing in electronic and IT systems at the African School of Meteorology and Civil Aviation (EAMAC) in Niamey

job3.title: Senior Network, IT Systems and Meteorological Equipment Specialist
job3.description: Administration of IT and meteorological systems for air navigation in Benin.
responsibilities: Administration and maintenance of networks (Cisco Switch, Cisco Router, Mikrotik Router, MESSIR COM, MUX, etc.) and IT systems (Radio Chain, Topsky, AMHS-RSFTA, Alcatel, etc.) for air navigation assistance
Administration and maintenance of meteorological equipment with electronic components (SAOMA, SAOSS, SADIS, SAAPI, EARTHNETWORK, SMT-SIO)
Participation in the implementation of local IT projects (SAGIM, RADAR METEO, etc.)
Technical support and assistance to Representation users
